items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t tell me because he\'d promised Mary that he wouldn\'t.
Tom\'s parents were disappointed that he couldn\'t get into Harvard.
Tom asked Mary to teach him how to poach an egg in a microwave oven.
Tom wouldn\'t even give me a chance to explain why I did what I did.
While Tom is here, you might want to have him fix your leaky faucet.
Where on earth do you think that Tom is going at this time of night?
If Tom hadn\'t been working last weekend, he would\'ve gone fishing.
Tom knew he barely had enough money to buy everything he had to buy.
Tom knew that Mary was unlikely to want to go to the dance with him.
We all knew Tom was in trouble, but none of us did anything to help.
